data.description:
Come and Follow Me to 34.211.189.3:9090, look around and see if lightning strikes. A socat tty works better than netcat.

We've opened up the same thing on a second port as well: 34.211.189.3:9091

We've made it available on another box as well:
 54.200.186.220:9090
 54.200.186.220:9091

Written by __dyn

(Note: the theme of the challenge is very important. if there's a point where you feel like you're guessing random input, note think of that and also note that it's a number not a string)
data.name: j0hnny_5
